title: Dark elven gloves

| Material                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | [spider silk](/wiki/Spider_silk "Spider silk")                |

**Dark elven gloves** are a type of [gloves](/wiki/Gloves "Gloves") that appear in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). They are made of [spider silk](/wiki/Spider_silk "Spider silk"), and have a [randomized appearance](/wiki/Randomized_appearance "Randomized appearance") when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

## Generation

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven gloves' random appearance. Drow [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") and [Monks](/wiki/Monk "Monk") start the game with dark elven gloves.

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") [mercenaries](/wiki/Mercenaries "Mercenaries") have a 2⁄3 chance of [generating with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") dark elven gloves that count for 1 point of their target generation [AC](/wiki/AC "AC"), while other non-[undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead") drow have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with dark elven gloves.

## Description

While worn, dark elven gloves grant 2 base AC. Drow gain a bonus point of AC while wearing dark elven gloves, and can safely enchant them to +7.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dark_elven_gloves\&action=edit)*

Material spider silk

Dark elven gloves are a type of gloves that appear in EvilHack. They are made of spider silk, and have a randomized appearance when unidentified.

Generation

Drow characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven gloves' random appearance. Drow Knights and Monks start the game with dark elven gloves.

Drow mercenaries have a 2⁄3 chance of generating with dark elven gloves that count for 1 point of their target generation AC, while other non-undead drow have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with dark elven gloves.

Description

While worn, dark elven gloves grant 2 base AC. Drow gain a bonus point of AC while wearing dark elven gloves, and can safely enchant them to +7.

'''Dark elven gloves''' are a type of [[gloves]] that appear in [[EvilHack]]. They are made of [[spider silk]], and have a [[randomized appearance]] when [[identification|unidentified]].

==Generation==
[[Drow (starting race)|Drow]] characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven gloves' random appearance. Drow [[Knight]]s and [[Monk]]s start the game with dark elven gloves.

[[Drow (monster attribute)|Drow]] [[mercenaries]] have a {{frac|2|3}} chance of [[Monster starting inventory|generating with]] dark elven gloves that count for 1 point of their target generation [[AC]], while other non-[[undead]] drow have a {{frac|6}} chance of generating with dark elven gloves.

==Description==
While worn, dark elven gloves grant 2 base AC. Drow gain a bonus point of AC while wearing dark elven gloves, and can safely enchant them to +7.
